thread.title: Signet Jewelers Schedules Fiscal 2018 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Release and Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Signet Jewelers Schedules Fiscal 2018 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Release and Conference Call
text:
HAMILTON, Bermuda--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Signet Jewelers Limited (NYSE: SIG) intends to announce its fourth quarter and full year results at approximately 7:00 a.m. ET on Wednesday, March 14, 2018.
On that date there will be a conference call at 8:00 a.m. ET and a simultaneous audio webcast and slide presentation available at www.signetjewelers.com . The slides will be available to be downloaded from the website ahead of the conference call.
The call details are:
Dial-in: +1 647-689-4229
Confirmation Code: 4076268
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180216005036/en/
Signet Jewelers Limited
James Grant, +1 330-668-5412
VP Investor Relations
or
David Bouffard, +1 330-668-5369
VP Corporate Affairs
Source: Signet Jewelers Limited
